title: Montana: The Magazine of Western History

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-note: The April 1965 issue is the earliest issue for which we can find a filed issue renewal. There is a copyright notice (without a year) on the contents page of that issue.   Similar copyright notices appear on the January 1965 and October 1964 issues, so those would automatically renew if valid. Spot-checks of earlier 1964 issues have not turned up copyright notices.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
